external/com.stripe.stripeterminal.external.callable/ReaderListener/onFinishInstallingUpdate

onFinishInstallingUpdate

open fun onFinishInstallingUpdate(update: ReaderSoftwareUpdate?, e: TerminalException? = null)
Content copied to clipboard

The terminal has finished installing a ReaderSoftwareUpdate.

Parameters

update

The ReaderSoftwareUpdate that was installed (or failed to be installed). This will be null if the Reader.availableUpdate field is null.

e

Any TerminalException that was thrown during an attempted installation. This will be null if the update completed without issue.
